g.H834: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
g.H4421: a battle (i.e. the engagement); generally, war (i.e. warfare)
g.H1: father, in a literal and immediate, or figurative and remote application
g.H3101: Joash, the name of six Israelites
g.H5221: to strike (lightly or severely, literally or figuratively)
g.H6471: a stroke, literally or figuratively (in various applications, as follow)
g.H3478: Jisrael, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity
